prompt: What section of this text would be better formatted as a bulleted list?
description: The sunflower is a yellow flowering plant that’s native to North and South America. Its scientific name is Helianthus annuus, and there are many varieties of this plant. The name “sunflower” comes from the large, yellow flower which resembles the sun. In addition to their large circular flowers, sunflower plants have rough stems and broad, rough leaves. Sunflowers are also known for their seeds, which are often eaten salted and roasted. The seeds were first brought to Europe in the 1500s and became a widely used ingredient.
feedback: This text doesn’t contain any long or complicated lists that would be more easily read as a bulleted list. There is no need for a bulleted list in this text.
